properties.name: apus.bluesky.hashtagURL
properties.description: The URL of the BlueSky API to get the posts containing a hashtag.

properties.name: apus.bluesky.instance
properties.description: The BlueSky instance used to read the posts from.

properties.name: apus.bluesky.mentionsURL
properties.description: The URL of the BlueSky API to get the posts mentioning a profile.

properties.name: apus.bluesky.postLimit
properties.description: The limit for the number of BlueSky posts when accessing the API.

properties.name: apus.bluesky.profile
properties.description: The profile (without the @) of a BlueSky user to get the mentions (empty = disabled).

properties.name: apus.demoMode
properties.description: Enable (true) or disable (false) the demo mode to show demo data only.

properties.name: apus.devoxx.eventApi
properties.description: The URL of the Devoxx API to read the conference agenda.

properties.name: apus.devoxx.eventId
properties.description: The ID of the Devoxx event to read the conference agenda.

properties.name: apus.devoxx.weekday
properties.description: The day of the week of the Devoxx event to read the conference agenda.

properties.name: apus.doag.eventApi
properties.description: The URL of the DOAG event API to read the conference agenda.

properties.name: apus.doag.eventId
properties.description: The ID of the DOAG event to read the conference agenda.

properties.name: apus.event.dateAdjust
properties.description: Adjust the date of the event, ISO-8601 formatted (P0D = disabled).

properties.name: apus.event.image
properties.description: The URL of the image to be shown below the event agenda (empty = no image).

properties.name: apus.event.nextSessionTimeout
properties.description: Number of minutes a session is shown before it starts.

properties.name: apus.event.showEmptyRooms
properties.description: Show (true) or hide (false) empty event rooms.

properties.name: apus.event.showLegend
properties.description: Show (true) or hide (false) the event room legend.

properties.name: apus.event.timeAdjust
properties.description: Adjust the time of the event, ISO-8601 formatted (PT0D = disabled).

properties.name: apus.event.updateFrequency
properties.description: How often (in minutes) to update event data.

properties.name: apus.jfs.dbUrl
properties.description: The URL of the database file for Java Forum Stuttgart.

properties.name: apus.language
properties.description: Language code of the language used for the UI.

properties.name: apus.mastodon.accessToken
properties.description: The Mastodon access token . TODO: Marcus you turn

properties.name: apus.mastodon.instance
properties.description: The Mastodon instance used to read the posts from.

properties.name: apus.mastodon.postAPI
properties.description: The URL of the Mastodon API to read the posts.

properties.name: apus.mastodon.postLimit
properties.description: The limit for the number of Mastodon posts when accessing the API.

properties.name: apus.password
properties.description: The password to get admin access (empty = disabled).

properties.name: apus.sessionize.eventApi
properties.description: The URL of the Sessionize API to read the conference agenda.

properties.name: apus.sessionize.eventId
properties.description: The ID of the Sessionize event to read the conference agenda.

properties.name: apus.sessionize.SpeakerApi
properties.description: The URL of the Sessionize API to read the speaker information.

properties.name: apus.social.filter.length
properties.description: Hide social media messages which exceed this length.

properties.name: apus.social.filter.replies
properties.description: Hide social media messages which are replies.

properties.name: apus.social.filter.sensitive
properties.description: Hide social media messages which contain sensitive information.

properties.name: apus.social.filter.words
properties.description: Hide social media messages which contain these words.

properties.name: apus.social.hashtags
properties.description: A list of comma separated hashtags for social media posts.

properties.name: apus.social.headline
properties.description: Overwrite the headline for social media posts.

properties.name: apus.social.imageLimit
properties.description: Limit number of images per social media post.

properties.name: apus.social.imagesEnabled
properties.description: Enable or disable images in social media posts.

properties.name: apus.social.numberOfColumns
properties.description: How many columns to be used for social media posts.

properties.name: apus.styles
properties.description: Inject custom styles into the user interface.

properties.name: apus.timezone
properties.description: The timezone used for date and time calculations.
